ProcessProbLogicData.string:
Default logic developed through a series of Regional Workshops with silviculturists, ecologists, and fire specialists - May through December 1998.
Mountain Pine Beetle in lodgepole pine
The logic for mountain pine beetle probability in lodgepole pine is built upon the hazard rating system in Amman et. al. 1977. Guidelines for reducing losses of lodgepole pine to the mountain pine beetle in unmanaged stands in the Rocky Mountains. General Technical Report INT-36
Mountain Pine Beetle in ponderosa pine
The basis for the probability of mountain pine beetle in ponderosa pine starts wtih the determination of a hazard. This hazard is based on the research work documented in "Risk Rating Guide for Mountain Pine Beetle in Black Hills Ponderosa Pine. Stevens, McCambridge, and Edminster 1980.

Default logic developed through a series of Regional Workshops with silviculturists, ecologists, and fire specialists - May through December 1998.
